MatrixQuest,"2017-04-22T19:59:23.46Z","Poor design and not much there...","

This set is not really worth the price as there is little to it.

column2: t that great and it bows when assembled due to too little support.&nbsp
column4: t as strong as it could be and doesn&#39
column5: t really look like a complete movie set.&nbsp

column2: t fit larger model phones such as the LG V20 which many of the newer phones are.&nbsp
column3: It also has no controls for the left to right movement or zoom.&nbsp
column4: It only has controls for tilting forward or back.&nbsp

column1: There is no software included to use that would include Batman themed effects so you have to trial and error with third-party software.
I give this a very low score.
